title: 16th April 1922: Former WW1 enemies Germany and Russia sign the Treaty of Rapallo
itunes:summary: The Treaty of Rapallo meant the two countries ended all territorial and financial arguments stemming from the previous Treaty of Brest-Litovsk and agreed to ‘co-operate in a spirit of mutual goodwill in meeting the economic needs of both ...
